subtitle: Skewers of chicken, cherry tomatoes and baby onions served with mixed wild rice salad.

ingredients.ingredient: long grain rice and wild rice

method.text: Cook the rice, according to pack instructions.
Meanwhile, peel the onions and place in a pan of lightly salted water. Bring to the boil and boil for 10 min. Drain.

While the rice and onions are cooking: cut each chicken breast into eight equal cubes. Season to taste. Thread onto skewers (2 per serving), alternating with a cherry tomato and the drained baby onions. Repeat until skewer is full.
Mix the parsley with a little seasme oil. Brush over the skewers. Grill under a medium preheated grill for 8-10 min until chicken is cooked and onions are brown.
Serve on a bed of the cooked rice.

title: Grilled chicken skewers
